0.text: Bug 3970  [preferences] UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files (1GFIOAX).

1.text: When creating a new file we currently use the line delimiter returned form System.getProperties("line.delimiter").

2.text: But this is not 	whay a user always wants.

3.text: Consider the following sceanrio:  		- Unix and Windows work station used to develop a Unix product / program.

4.text: - the Windows work stations are used as X terminals and to run Eclipse (since PC are cheaper than Unix boxes).

5.text: - even if the new file is created on Windows it should have Unix line delimiters since the end product is a Unix product.

6.text: There should be a UI (Preference) to define the line delimiter for new files.

7.text: Possible values are:  		- Dos / Windows 		- Mac 		- Unix 		- default platform line delimiter.

8.text: The UI should be provided by the Workbench since all plugins should use the same line delimiter for new files.
